mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RN, A.* FROM (select * from mrp.leather as leather, mrp.company as company where leather.compnum = company.compnum ORDER by leatherNum desc ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RN, A.* FROM (select * from mrp.subsidiary as sub, mrp.company as com where sub.compnum = com.compnum ORDER by subsidiaryNum desc ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RN, A.* FROM (select * from mrp.accessory as acc, mrp.company as com where acc.compnum = com.compnum ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RN, A.* FROM (select * from mrp.materialother as mo, mrp.company as com where mo.compnum = com.compnum ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select * from mrp.leather as lea, mrp.company as com where lea.compnum = com.compnum and lea.leatherNum = #{leatherNum} ::integer
select * from mrp. subsidiary as sub , mrp.company as com where sub.compnum = com.compnum and sub.subsidiaryNum = #{subsidiaryNum} ::integer
select * from mrp.accessory as acc , mrp.company as com where acc.compnum = com.compnum and accessoryNum = #{accessoryNum} ::integer

mapper.update: update mrp.leather set leatherName = #{leatherName}, leatherType = #{leatherType}, amount = #{amount} ::integer, compNum = #{compNum} ::integer, price = #{price} ::integer where leatherNum = #{leatherNum} ::integer

update mrp.subsidiary set subsidiaryName = #{subsidiaryName}, subsidiaryType = #{subsidiaryType}, amount = #{amount} ::integer, compNum = #{compNum} ::integer, price = #{price} ::integer where subsidiaryNum = #{subsidiaryNum} ::integer
update mrp.accessory set accessoryName = #{accessoryName}, amount = #{amount} ::integer, compNum = #{compNum} ::integer, price = #{price} ::integer where accessoryNum = #{accessoryNum} ::integer

update mrp.materialOther set materialOtherName = #{materialOtherName}, amount = #{amount} ::integer, compNum = #{compNum} ::integer , price = #{price} ::integer where materialOtherNum = #{materialOtherNum} ::integer
